overview:
CEO Jon Gelberg comes to AwardsandHonors.com from Marquis Whoâ€™s Who LLC, where, as Senior Managing Director, he was responsible for setting the standards for admission for Whoâ€™s Who in America, Whoâ€™s Who in the World and other Whoâ€™s Who directories.

Gelberg had previously been the Executive Vice President at LuxuryFinder.com and, previous to that, had been a journalist for 13 years.

Gelberg has his JD degree from Columbia University’s School of Law and is a Magna Cum Laude graduate of Brandeis University.
